Class DrawingSurface

  • java.lang.Object
    • processing.core.PApplet
      • core.DrawingSurface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    processing.core.PConstants, ScreenSwitcher

    public class DrawingSurface
extends processing.core.PApplet
implements ScreenSwitcher
    Version:
    5/14/22
    Author:
    Tapish Singh This is the main class for the Processing drawing utlility

    • Constructor Detail

      • DrawingSurface

        public DrawingSurface()
        No args constructor for DrawingSurface object Initializes all of the screens and adds them to the array of screens. Inspired by screen switching mechanism in physicsDemoAP

        Switches to a different screen based on parameter passed through

        Parameters:
        i - the screen number you want to switch to

      • handleDropListEvents

        public void handleDropListEvents(g4p_controls.GDropList list,
                                 g4p_controls.GEvent event)
        Method for handling selection of options in difficulty drop down menu on splash screen. Sends selection result of dropdown menu to GameMap class to set difficulty.
        Parameters:
        list - The dropdown list
        event - The specific interaction with the drop down list

      • handleButtonEvents

        public void handleButtonEvents(g4p_controls.GButton button,
                               g4p_controls.GEvent event)
        Method for handling clicking of buttons on the splash screen.\nClicking the Controls button will bring up a pop up window, while clicking the Play button will start the game.
        Parameters:
        button - The specific button in question
        event - The specific interaction with said button
